title: CertServer config file
description: Describes the options allowed in the CertServer config file and assists in validation.

root.description: The root directory for CertServer's database and files.

port.description: The port CertServer will listen on for incoming connections.

certificate.description: The path to the SSL certificate file.

key.description: The path to the SSL key file.

hashSecret.description: The secret used to hash passwords when authentication is used.

keySecret.description: The secret used to encrypt and decrypt keys.

subject.description: The default subject information for created certificates.

C.description: The country code for the certificate subject.

ST.description: The state or province for the certificate subject.

L.description: The locality for the certificate subject.

O.description: The organization for the certificate subject.

OU.description: The organizational unit for the certificate subject.
